extendedInfo.description: WARNING: this app does not and will never display which app drains your battery. If you plan to give bad ratings because of this lack of feature, please go away and DO NOT download!This app suffers from people that do not read app description.This is simply IMPOSSIBLE. If you want so, I know many apps that inspect your CPU every second or memory and that really drains your battery, you will easily find such apps, but definitely not mine.When tracking my battery usage, I was always missing something...That information was the Battery drain in percent per hour.I just made this app for my personal use and it's now time to share it.This app will always sleep and wake up every time your battery drop one percent to save the current battery state and the time. On the next battery drop, I will compute the battery drain.I plan to work on the User interface and improve it during next weeks/month, feel free to contact me if you have suggestion/ideas.Keep in mind that this app has to stay simple and minimalist.

reviews.title: Love the \"kill kittens\" part.
reviews.comment: When I turn certain apps on and off I get a pretty good idea over a few hours what apps are draining more battery use. Great idea. Looking forward to future improvements but it\'s good to go, for now :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: simple and useful
reviews.comment: appreciate a Dev that makes an app that gets the job done. mainly use this to monitor the battery efficiency of custom ROMs
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A must have
reviews.comment: Excellent app, very useful to track everyday\'s battery consumption.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great tool
reviews.comment: Perfect for check for battery drain problem. Quit compact. Does not drain battery itself.
reviews.author: Sailesh Rangoon

reviews.title: Good app.
reviews.comment: It makes monitoring battery consumption a very trivial task. Easy to use and intuitive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Essential
reviews.comment: This is a great app for analyzing battery use on a real time basis and weed out battery hogs. Elegance through simplicity. 5 stars.   UPDATE: The 09 update KILLED this app on my Galaxy Tab 7 Plus (Android 3.2). 091 fixed problem in less than a day. Cant beat that!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GOOD APP FOR ITS FUNCTIONS DOES WHAT IT SAYS!
reviews.comment: GOOD APP FOR ITS FUNCTIONS DOES WHAT IT SAYS ! the visual graph of battery drain analyser is good but i will appreciate if the explanation legend bellow the graph is more detailed info ! ( i still give it a 5-star rating )  THANK YOU FOR YOU GOOD WORK , KEEP IT FREE ! APPRECIATE YOUR HARD WORK AND WILLINGNESS TO SHARE YOUR KNOWLEDGE AND EXPERIENCE !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Negative reviews don\'t seem to \"get it\"
reviews.comment: There is plenty of good in knowing that your battery is draining faster. Having had battery problems in the past, I install apps one by one and check each app introduces no new problems. The method of this app should (hopefully) mean there is minimal battery drain. If you want a list of what apps are draining your battery then install something else, but don\'t expect those other battery apps to include themselves in the list of high drainers ... which they should, because they are.  So if you don\'t get it and don\'t ready the description, just walk on by rather than leave an unfair bad review.  To the author ... have you thought about notifications if battery drain exceeds a certain threshold, like mine does for no apparent reason every now and then? This could then be picked up by an app such as Llama which could reboot the phone overnight ....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant app
reviews.comment: Still got room for improvement but it is ok the way is, lean and light, does not drain battery life.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s2
reviews.comment: I have been getting some battery problems with my s2 all my sections are red! Does that mean something is wrong?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mostly useless
reviews.comment: What good is it to know that your battery is draining, if it won\'t tell you which apps were running at the time it took each snapshot? Seriously, who finds this app useful?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Did not work for Motorola Razr
reviews.comment: Battery went from 70% to 60% and all I got were 2 messages that said something to effect that the first two readings were inaccurate, wait for more analysis. Uninstall.
reviews.author: t ixoye

reviews.title: Still a long way to go..
reviews.comment: I am using this app for an analysis regarding a GPS battery drain issue that we are facingand it has been of great help. Thank you.  Things that are not there and certainly welcome.  1. Graphs are more easy to read compared to the list in Battery drain screen. 2. The list doesn\'t refresh itself. Everytime you have to go back and come again to refresh. 3. The summary window is not clear. Temporal Partition !! What?? 4. After exporting the data in a csv, I think you should give an option to the user to either see it directly, if possible or share it over an email.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DEV 5 STARS FOR U
reviews.comment: Awesome app, app uses small amount of app and ram. Thanks to DEV for not making this app like others which sucks battery to observe apps for battery draining.
reviews.author: Deepak Dutta

reviews.title: GOOD APP GO FOR IT...
reviews.comment: Excellent application,  I would recommend it to anyone easily Intuitive to use but it\'s not a battery percentage indicator no,,  try elsewhere ITS Not for newbies. Thanks! David
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: basic, useful
reviews.comment: a small and a neat app for battery monitoring

reviews.title: Think about it
reviews.comment: Like no one cares when (time frame) the battery is being drain.. We want to know what apps are doing so

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It will be nice to add a taskbar icon
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful app!!!
reviews.comment: This app help me a lot.
reviews.author: Daniel Heled

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Blaze 4G, ICS
reviews.comment: This is a very good app for keeping track of when the battery is draining fast and when it isn\'t. It\'s simple, clear, and does just what it says, without a lot of complication.
reviews.author: A Google User
